DOC.brief_summary: This is a control matched prospective study evaluating the use of seromuscular flap for high risk anastomoses.
DOC.brief_title: Pedicled Seromuscular Flap For Enforcement Of High Risk Intestinal Anastomoses
DOC.detailed_description: 30 eligible patients have been enrolled in the study then each case was matched to a control of patients who undwerwent resection anastomosis with primary anastomosis only in the same study period in terms of age, gender, comorbidity, diagnosis.
DOC.criteria: all patients with high risk anastomoses
